thread.title: BRIEF-Copper Mountain Mining Announces Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.08

title: BRIEF-Copper Mountain Mining Announces Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.08

organizations.name: reuters staff  copper mountain mining corp

text:
36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Copper Mountain Mining Announces Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.08 Reuters Staff
 Copper Mountain Mining Corp:
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING ANNOUNCES Q1-2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP - QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP QTRLY REVENUES ABOUT $77.9 MILLION VERSUS $74.1 MILLION
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP QTRLY TOTAL POUNDS OF COPPER SOLD 21.7 MILLION LBS VERSUS 19 MILLION LBS
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP - QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.04
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP QTRLY REALIZED COPPER PRICE $3.17 VERSUS $2.65 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
